attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Campaigners have been fighting hard to stop the proposed incinerator from being built in Newhaven.

Do these councillors ever listen to the public? Does Chris Wick, environment manager, live in Newhaven?

East Sussex County has totally ignored the people of Newhaven on their views on this project.
I hope people will turn against local councillors in next year's elections.

Newhaven residents are fed up with being treated like secondclass citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
